metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3202 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: A NULL pointer dereference flaw in diFree in fs/jfs/inode.c in JournaledFile System (JFS)in the Linux kernel. This could allow a local attacker tocrash the system or leak kernel internal information.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').

linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
